All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddMenuItemPage
 
AdminAccessPage
This class is the page that the admin will see after logging in This page facilitates the admin's access to the system The admin can manage staff, branches, and payment methods
AdminManageBranchPage
This page allows the admin to manage branches The admin can open/enable a branch and close/disable a branch
AdminManagePaymentPage
This page allows the admin to manage payment methods The admin can view all payment methods, enable a payment method, and disable a payment method
AdminManageStaffPage
The AdminManageStaffPage class is a page that allows the admin to manage staff members The admin can view all staff members, fire staff members, hire staff members, and promote staff members The admin can also go back to the AdminAccessPage
ApplepayPaymentService
 
Branch
The Branch class encapsulates the attributes and contains the methods for operations related to Branches

BrowseCategoriesPage
 
BrowseDrinksPage
 
BrowseSetMealPage
 
BrowseSidesPage

EditMenuItemsPage
 
EditOrderPage
 
FilePaths
Enum representing file paths for various data files.
iLoginService
 
iPage
This interface will be implemented by all pages.
iPaymentService
This interface is implemented by every new type of payment service class.
LoadBranches
The LoadStaffs class loads Branch data from the CSV database
LoadData<T>
Abstract class for loading of data from CSV
LoadMenuItems
The LoadStaffs class loads MenuItem data from the CSV database
LoadOrders
 
LoadStaffs
The LoadStaffs class loads Staff data and corresponding passwords from the CSV database
Logger
This class should be used for logging messages in the project
LoginDetail
This class is used for storing the staff's log in details
mainFOMSApp
 
MainPage
This is the Main Page that the user will see.
ManageBranchService
Service class for managing branches
ManageMenuService
The ManageMenuService class contains methods to manage the menu items in the system
ManagePaymentsService
This class contains mainly static methods pertaining to payment management.
ManagerAccessPage
 
ManageStaffService
This class provides services to manage staff
MealCategory
Enum representing all the meal categories
MenuItem
 
Order
Represents an order placed by a customer.
OrderStatus
Enum representing all the types of order statuses
PageViewer
This class serves to manage the different pages.
PathTracker
 
PaymentDetails
This class represents a record of payment transaction.
PaymentServiceDisabledException
 
PersistenceHandler
This class is used to handle data persistence between multiple instances of the FOMS application.
ProcessOrderService
 
Role
Enum to represent staff roles.
SelectBranchPage
This is the SelectBranchPage that the user will see.
SelectCategoriesPage
 
SerialiseCSV
Class that reads and writes data with CSV files
Session
This class acts as a data store and contains all active entities in the programme.
Settings
Enum to define the programme-wide settings.
Staff
 
StaffAccessPage
 
StaffLoginPage
This is the page that the staff will first see This page facilitates the logging in of staff.
StaffLoginService
Service class for authenticating staff logins and managing their passwords.
